languages.text: "Так Ахиллеас не просто исчез... Ты помогла ему исчезнуть". {n}Хейнрикс коротко кивает.{/n} "Что ж, в своей смерти виноват лишь он сам. Агент, не умеющий распознать приближающуюся опасность, бесполезен".

traits.locale_text: "Так Ахиллеас не просто исчез... Ты помогла ему исчезнуть". {n}Хейнрикс коротко кивает.{/n} "Что ж, в своей смерти виноват лишь он сам. Агент, не умеющий распознать приближающуюся опасность, бесполезен".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."
languages.original_text: "Так Ахиллеас не просто исчез... Ты помогла ему исчезнуть". {n}Хейнрикс коротко кивает.{/n} "Что ж, в своей смерти виноват лишь он сам. Агент, не умеющий распознать приближающуюся опасность, бесполезен".

traits.locale_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognize an impending danger is useless."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognize an impending danger is useless."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending danger is useless."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending danger is useless."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ainsi donc, Achilleas n'a pas simplement disparu... Vous l'y avez aidé, {n}dit Heinrix en hochant sèchement de la tête.{/n} Il ne peut s'en prendre qu'à lui-même. Un agent incapable de sentir un danger imminent ne vaut rien. »
languages.original_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi donc, Achilleas n'a pas simplement disparu... Vous l'y avez aidé, {n}dit Heinrix en hochant sèchement de la tête.{/n} Il ne peut s'en prendre qu'à lui-même. Un agent incapable de sentir un danger imminent ne vaut rien. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “也就是说，阿吉里亚斯并不是凭空消失了……而是被你灭口了。”{n}海因里希简短地点点头。{/n}“我只能说，这得怪他自己。既然他没有意识到迫在眉睫的威胁，那这样的特工也派不上什么用场。”
languages.original_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，阿吉里亚斯并不是凭空消失了……而是被你灭口了。”{n}海因里希简短地点点头。{/n}“我只能说，这得怪他自己。既然他没有意识到迫在眉睫的危险，那这样的特工也派不上什么用场。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「アキレアスはただ姿を消したのではなく…消えるのをあなたが手伝ったのだ」{n}ハインリックスはぞんざいにうなずいた。{/n}「責められるべきは彼自身だと言える。迫りくる脅威を察知できない諜報員は役に立たない」
languages.original_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."

traits.locale_text: 「アキレアスはただ姿を消したのではなく…消えるのをあなたが手伝ったのだ」{n}ハインリックスはぞんざいにうなずいた。{/n}「責められるべきは彼自身だと言える。迫りくる脅威を察知できない諜報員は役に立たない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Achilleas verschwand also gar nicht wirklich ... Ihr habt dabei geholfen." {n}Heinrix nickt kurz.{/n} "Ich finde, dass hat er sich selbst zuzuschreiben. Ein Agent, der eine drohende Gefahr nicht erkennt, ist nicht zu gebrauchen."
languages.original_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas verschwand also gar nicht wirklich ... Ihr habt dabei geholfen." {n}Heinrix nickt kurz.{/n} "Ich finde, dass hat er sich selbst zuzuschreiben. Ein Agent, der die drohende Gefahr nicht erkennt, ist nicht zu gebrauchen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces Achilleas no se desvaneció sin más... tú le ayudaste a desaparecer». {n}Heinrix asiente brevemente.{/n} «Tal y como yo lo veo, la culpa fue solo suya. Un agente incapaz de reconocer una amenaza inminente es inservible».
languages.original_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces Achilleas no se desvaneció sin más... tú le ayudaste a desaparecer». {n}Heinrix asiente brevemente.{/n} «Tal y como yo lo veo, la culpa fue solo suya. Un agente incapaz de reconocer el peligro no tiene ninguna utilidad».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Demek Achilleas durup dururken yok olmadı. Onun kaybolmasına yardımcı oldun." {n}Heinrix, başıyla sert bir onaylama hareketi yapıyor.{/n} "Hatanın kendisinde olduğu kanısındayım. Yaklaşmakta olan bir tehdidi fark edemeyen bir ajan, işe yaramaz bir ajandır."
languages.original_text: "So Achilleas did not simply vanish... You helped him disappear." {n}Heinrix nods curtly.{/n} "I say he had only himself to blame. An agent who cannot recognise an impending threat is useless."

traits.locale_text: "Demek Achilleas durup dururken yok olmadı. Onun kaybolmasına yardımcı oldun." {n}Heinrix başıyla sert bir onaylama hareketi yapıyor.{/n} "Hatanın kendisinde olduğu kanısındayım. Yaklaşmakta olan bir tehdidi fark edemeyen bir ajan, işe yaramaz bir ajandır."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
